channel.title: Philosophy on विचारमञ्जरी (Vichāramañjarī)
channel.description: Recent content in Philosophy on विचारमञ्जरी (Vichāramañjarī)

item.title: Frameworks | Using Philosophy to Order Life
item.description: Can adopting a philosophical model help you navigate life’s chaos? Rather than chasing absolute truths, maybe philosophies—Stoicism, Buddhism, Chanakya’s Nīti—serve as practical frameworks which you live, test, and refine to bring order to your experiences.
